entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @SecPompeo @realDonaldTrump @SecPompeo you refused to contradict POTUS and say #Coronavirus #COVID19 is NOT  a hoax in a Congressional Hearing. You then went on FOX & called it the “Wuhan Virus” in order to further spread the administration’s hateful xenophobia & “otherism”. America will never forget that.
